summary: The rags we all know and (not) love, now a little cooler.
descriptionHtml: Pretty simple procedure, really. The [color=#B45F06]Rags[/color] that greet us at the beginning of the game, and when in Cidhna Mine, are now [color=#b6b6b6]Monochromatic[/color] because [color=#ff0000]Santa [color=#ffffff]has a beard (basically, because I can), and because those rags were no way to greet an adventurer like all of us. Wouldn't you agree, Dovahkiins?[/color][/color]
author: TwoSyxxtySeven
